The game starts but the application freezes. What could be the issue?

I've admin rights, Win7 64-bit and latest updates of everything.
When a 2D game requires windows 7 I know there is a huge problem.

Here is the minimum requirements from the official page:

Operating system: Windows XP SP2
Processor: Pentium D 2,6 Ghz, or AMD Athlon 64 x2
Memory: 1GB
Hard Disk Space: 2GB
Video: NVIDIA GF 7800GTX, ATI X1300
DirectX: DirectX9

Neither DX10 or Windows 7 is required!
